mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.personid, t1.grade, func_get_dicvalue(t1.grade,'ZYDJ') gradeShow, t1.givenname, t1.issuer, t1.getdate, t1.teachingmanagement, t1.studentmanagement, t1.politicalcounselor, t1.psychologicalconsultant, t1.employmentoffice, t1.expertise, t1.workinghours from T_TAB_STAFF t1 where t1.id = #{id}

SELECT decode(DEPT_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || DEPT_NAME) as "label", decode(DEPT_ID, '', t.person_id, DEPT_ID || ',' || t.person_id) as "value" FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE t LEFT JOIN (SELECT R.user_id PERSON, D.DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_ID FROM t_sys_user R, T_SYS_DEPT D WHERE R.Default_Dept = D.DEPT_ID and R.user_id = #{personid}) ON T.PERSON_ID = PERSON WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1' and t.person_id = #{personid}
